content:
From: Joachim Breitner <breitner@kit.edu>
Hi,

thanks to the help on this list I was able to create a small command
that suggest a suitable theory for a lemma, after you have stated and
proved it in a theory with more dependencies than necessary.

See https://github.com/nomeata/isa-where-to-move
for an example, installation instructions, a little bit of documentation
and especially the incomplete list of "Bugs and shortcomings".

Let me know if you found it useful!

Greetings,
Joachim
signature.asc
